content:
can you create content for this topic in the following order:

Plan Your Next Maui Trip with Family Vacation Rentals

- summary of why the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary is a must-visit spot in Kihei for the whole family
- introduce Family Vacation Rentals to make the most of their Maui trip and inform them that we give the best kid-friendly hotels and family-friendly rentals with over 10 million listings to choose from, making it easy to filter and compare family amenities and services, giving them more time to create memories on their family holiday.
- then a convincing, yet not too salesy call to action
